item.title: Comments In Google Reader Shared Items Are Here
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: Since quite some time, Google Reader has included the feature to share interesting items with your friends who also use Google Reader. Some time back they also added the option to “Share with a Note” to add your take to the shared piece. But I always thought there was no way to share back by comments (or see my friends’ take) about that particular article.
